Hero.title: Welcome to
Hero.subtitle: Quiet luxury in the heart of nature.
Hero.description: Wake up among mogotes and plantations. The Viñales Valley at your feet in an exclusive stay, where luxury means feeling at home from the very first coffee.

suite1.title: JUNIOR SUITE I
suite1.desc: Exclusive and cozy atmosphere. Bilingual service, En-suite bathroom, A/C, 2 double beds, and complimentary minibar.

suite2.title: JUNIOR SUITE II
suite2.desc: Exclusive and cozy atmosphere. Bilingual service, En-suite bathroom, A/C, 2 double beds, and complimentary minibar.

villa.title: TWO-BEDROOM SUITE
villa.desc: Total privacy. An intimate, quiet, and exclusive environment with flexible check-in and local guide.

Location.title: Worry-Free Arrival
Location.subtitle: We pick you up at the door of your accommodation and take you to our home.
